product.title: Cherries
product.name: Stella
product.description: the fruit is large (7-8 g), cordiform, bright red;-the pulp is of medium firmness;-the fruit is susceptible to cracking;-the flesh is stony, crunchy, red, sweet-bitter, pleasant to the taste.

product.title: Cherries
product.name: Van
product.description: - The fruit is large, sweet, with a special aroma- the fruit is bright red

product.title: Cherries
product.name: Kordia
product.description: - the fruits are large (8-11gr), cordiform, elongated, red brilliant;- the pulp is stony, juicy, sweet taste, non-adherent to the stone.

product.title: Cherries
product.name: Boambe de Cotnari
product.description: -Boambe de Cotnari variety is considered the most valuable cherry variety of all local varieties; -the fruit is large (10gr), cordiform, round with colored skin golden yellow with reddish pink spots.-stony pulp, yellow, sweet and harmoniously sour.

product.title: Pear
product.name: Xenia
product.description: very large, fruits of about 200-360 grams with a diameter of 7-9 cm, green in color, and after storage it becomes yellow-green.

product.title: Pear
product.name: Conference
product.description: medium-large fruit, fruit of about 200-300 grams with a diameter of 5-8 cm, sweet and aromatic, it is yellow

product.title: Plum
product.name: Jubileum
product.description: fruit shape spherical, very large 50 grams, pink-reddish color, yellow pulp, juicy.

product.title: Plum
product.name: Victoria
product.description: spherical shape, slightly asymmetrical, purple color, yellow-green pulp, medium juicy.

product.title: Apple
product.name: Idared
product.description: medium-large fruit, 170-200 grams, sour to sweet taste, white pulp, consistent

product.title: Apple
